item.description: On Thursday, November 10, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society and the Humanists of BU will present “The Incompatibility of Science and Religion,” a talk by Victor Stenger, Prof. Emeritus of Physics & Astronomy (U. of Hawaii), based on a forthcoming book God and the Folly of Faith. Location: Rm. 203 in the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com or HumanistsOfBU@gmail.com.
item.name: Victor Stenger: "The Incompatibility of Science and Religion"
